dcterms:description: A dataset created to address Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) by users and their corresponding relevant replies, collected from client interactions on social media platforms.
dcterms:title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing text embeddings for various languages, used to enhance the performance of natural language understanding tasks.
dcterms:title: fastText Word Embeddings

dcterms:creator: J. Devlin
M.-W. Chang
K. Lee
K. Toutanova
dcterms:description: A language model that pre-trains deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding, used to improve the performance of various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: BERT Language Model

dcterms:creator: F. Feng
Y. Yang
D. Cer
N. Arivazhagan
W. Wang
dcterms:description: A language-agnostic sentence embedding model that encodes texts from different languages into a shared embedding space, enhancing multilingual NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Language-Agnostic BERT Sentence Embedding (LaBSE)
